name: IC PUNK
description:
IC PUNK

Made for the Extra Credits Game Jam 2020.

One day you come home to your apartment and find a mysterious device and a note on your floor. The note says the device is an IC PUNK, used to hack circuits. You decide to follow the note's instructions. What's the worst that could happen?

Extra Translation: All the in-world text is in one of two written languages, TWC and Sendralese. (They don't actually say anything, though. They're just decoration.)

Extra Retro: I'm using a 4-color palette called Dream by Brandon James Greer. It's not technically one of the given palettes but I hope it still counts.

AS OF NOW THIS GAME IS STILL VERY WIP. I just wanted to upload something playable early.
